Definition.Document:
Mass Flow Rate

Objective

Determine the mass flow rate from the volume flow rate at standard conditions.

Assumptions

  • Assume standard conditions to be 15 C and 1 bar as defined by the Society of Petroleum Engineers (SPE)
  • Assume composition is pure methane

Analysis

1. Determine the density of the compressed gas at standard conditions. (workstep)

2. Determine the mass flow rate and convert to kg/h. (workstep)
